summary: A view mixin that enforces OTP-based authentication for any Django view it is mixed into, ensuring the current user has completed a one‑time password verification before the request proceeds. It intercepts the request flow, redirects unauthenticated or non‑OTP‑verified users to the appropriate login or verification pages, and supplies configurable URLs for those redirects.
business_intent: To add a reusable security layer that mandates two‑factor authentication across protected endpoints, simplifying compliance with OTP requirements and reducing duplicated verification logic.
